contract_details.description: Execute Phase 1 Batch 1A of the systematic cleanup mission: Core Architecture Consolidation. Consolidate 50 core service files, eliminate architectural duplication, implement SOLID principles, and reduce core complexity from 13 to <5 modules.
contract_details.background: The repository currently has 358 consolidation opportunities identified. Phase 1 focuses on high-impact, low-risk architectural improvements that establish a solid foundation for subsequent phases.
objectives: Consolidate 15+ core service files in src/core/
Eliminate architectural duplication and circular dependencies
Implement SOLID principles across all core modules
Create unified core interfaces and abstractions
Reduce core complexity score from 13 to <5 modules
Establish architectural patterns for Phase 2-4 consolidation
deliverables: Consolidated core module architecture (≤5 core modules)
SOLID compliance implementation across core services
Unified interface definitions for core components
Zero functional regressions in core functionality
technical_requirements: Core module consolidation without breaking changes
success_criteria: Core module count reduced from 13+ to ≤5 modules
SOLID compliance achieved across all core services
Zero circular dependencies in core architecture

dependencies: Repository analysis completed (358 consolidation opportunities identified)
Agent-6 onboarding completed and role understood
resources_required: Access to src/core/ directory and all submodules
SOLID principle implementation tools and patterns
Comprehensive testing framework and CI/CD pipeline
Peer review capabilities for architectural decisions

contract_history.details: Phase 1 Batch 1A contract created for core architecture consolidation mission
